name: Leprechauns VS Bears
description:
So yesterday I got the idea of making a St. Patrick's day themed game. The game has a few bugs that I'm working on fixing but I need to release the game before St. Patrick's day is over. So here it is:

Leprechaun VS Bears. A game where no leprechaun is safe from the evil bears. In order to live you must kill all of the bears before they kill you.

Controls:
Arrow keys to move. Spacebar to shoot and left shift to run.

If there is anything you would like to see in the game please comment. You can also comment on my Ur-Net Page http://urnet.net78.net/RoggieGaming
